Rulings.Goat:
“Soul Release” is a targeting effect.
● “Soul Release” may remove any number of cards from the GY from 1 to 5.

Rulings.Base: 1. You can select cards from you and your opponent's GY simultaneously. For example, you can select 2 cards from your GY and 3 from your opponent's GY.

PSCT.Edison: ① Target up to 5 cards in any GY(s); banish them.
PSCT.Tengu: ① Target up to 5 cards in any GY(s); banish them.
